a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: National average learning outcomes correspond to test scores across standardized, psychometrically robust international and regional
Data source: Angrist, Djankov, Goldberg, and Patrinos (2021)
Note: Not all observations are nationally representative. See the sources tab for more details.
